sdk_core/com.adition.sdk_core.api.services.event_listener/AdEventType

AdEventType

sealed class AdEventType

All possible types of events that can be processed or transmitted via the SDK.

The SDK can work with and pass some events to the app related to:

  • tracking;

  • user interaction with advertising;

  • transferring information from the renderer to the app.

This class is the parent container for all possible events that the SDK can process or transmit. An application can receive a subclass object of this class using AdEventListener.eventProcessed.

See also

AdEventListener

Signals that the ad server has been notified that the ad is ready to be displayed to the user.

data object UnloadRequest : AdEventType

Signals that the renderer wants to be closed.

Link copied to clipboard
data class Viewable(val percentage: AdEventType.VisibilityPercentage, val url: String) : AdEventType

Signals that the ad server has been notified that the ad is visible on the device's screen by a certain percentage.

enum VisibilityPercentage : Enum<AdEventType.VisibilityPercentage>

Representation of the percentage of visibility of the advertisement on the screen.
